message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper deals with natural language generation and coherence in storytelling, which falls under the purview of this sub-category. 
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper focuses on visual storytelling and the use of visual entities, which is a key aspect of computer vision. 
3. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper uses an encoder-decoder framework and proposes a glocal hierarchical attention model, which are common techniques in AI research. 
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper uses a machine learning approach to generate coherent visual stories. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper deals with the task of generating coherent stories based on a given set of entities, which can be seen as a form of information retrieval.
